##https://lyceum-allotments.github.io/2016/06/emscripten-and-sdl-2-tutorial-part-1/

DKSET(CRYPTO ${3RDPARTY}/cryptopp600)

### INSTALL ###
IF(NOT EXISTS "${CRYPTO}")
	DKSET(CURRENT_DIR ${DIGITALKNOB}/Download)
	DKDOWNLOAD(${DKONLINE}/Libs/cryptopp600.zip)
	DKEXTRACT(${DIGITALKNOB}/Download/cryptopp600.zip ${CRYPTO})
ENDIF()


### LINK ###
WIN_DEBUG_LIB(${CRYPTO}/${OS}/Debug/crypto.lib)
WIN_RELEASE_LIB(${CRYPTO}/${OS}/Release/crypto.lib)


### COMPILE ###
DKSETPATH(${CRYPTO}/${OS})
WIN32_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G ${GENERATOR} "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS=/DWIN32 /D_WINDOWS /W3 /nologo" "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS_DEBUG=/MTd /Od /Ob0 /Zi /RTC1 /DDEBUG /D_DEBUG" "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS_RELEASE=/MT /O2 /Ob2 /DNDEBUG" ${CRYPTO})
WIN32_VS_DEBUG(cryptopp600 crypto.sln crypto)
WIN32_VS_RELEASE(cryptopp600 crypto.sln crypto)
